hero.description: I'm a developer who's passionate about solving problems with modern technology.

sinarmas.description: I developed web and mobile applications using the low-code OutSystems platform for various internal company projects. In my work, I implemented features based on user needs and specified requirements. Additionally, I was also involved in application maintenance, including investigation and bug fixes on several running projects.

ppkd.title: Web Programming
ppkd.description: Attended Web Programming training at PPKD Jakarta Pusat, learning HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel (MVC), RESTful API, MySQL, React.js, Tailwind, and jQuery. Focus on hands-on practice and project development. Graduated with BNSP competency certification as a web developer.

upnvj.title: S1 - Informatics, UPNVJ
upnvj.description: Active as a committee member in various faculty and university activities, such as events, competitions, and webinars, which honed organizational, teamwork, and communication skills. Served as a teaching assistant for Introduction to Database (2020), responsible for guiding practicum, helping with material understanding, and supporting question preparation and assessment.

binar.title: Front End JavaScript - Binar Academy
binar.description: I focused on developing competencies in technology and digital fields through project-based learning methods, with emphasis on non-technical skills. I was also involved in real projects and learned to create dynamic websites using React.js.
